Description: [Key:LLPARTY_Description:Expands the party size to 6 by default. This can be increased/decreased at will via the settings menu, allowing you to have up to 10 party members at once. If the extender is enabled, the lobby will work with more than 4 players, allowing 5+ players in character creation (EXPERIMENTAL).]

Entries.Text: See the full changelog in the 'Change Notes' tab on the Steam Workshop page.

Changes:
Added a workaround for the story section where a shrine teleports you in Fort Joy, and you ultimately get the Bless spell. This event is normally limited to 4 avatar characters, at which point you no longer get teleported.
Note:The workaround will make sure a spot is open before making the teleportation work, otherwise a message will appear to inform you to wait until a player exits the Hall of Echoes.
Added a workaround for the intro scene in the Tutorial, which was hardcoded to 4 players. This fix will ensure the party doesn't remain 'frozen'.
